archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Discount Calculation
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Discounts Calculation determines charge discounts based on pricing plan; including discounts on recurring, one time, and usage charges. Discounts may be applied at different levels such as cross product, cross location, or cross customer (all customers that are part of a given group plan ï¿½ some affiliation). The discounts can be apportioned across multiple events.
